resources.string: Ingenious work, extraordinary quality, supreme business, public personality, fortitude and restraint. Swipe the screen to display dynamic effects, which can be interactive and save power. \ n1. Three-finger slide down to switch multiple colors \ n2. Three-finger slide right to switch between single play and loop play \ n3. Three-finger slide left to control whether to display signature
Playback speed is switched to %1$s times
You need to download your signature png file from Yiran theme public account and put it on the phone [internal storage / Pictures /] The file name must be
